mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employees (username, name, password, phone, email, avatar, sex, id_number, role, dept_id, position_id, work_status, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) VALUES (#{username}, #{name}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{avatar}, #{sex}, #{idNumber}, #{role}, #{deptId}, #{positionId}, #{workStatus}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser})

INSERT INTO employees (username, name, password, phone, sex, role, work_status, service_no, online_status, max_concurrent_customers, current_customer_count, skill_tags, service_level, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{username}, #{name}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{sex}, #{role}, #{workStatus}, #{serviceNo}, #{onlineStatus}, #{maxConcurrentCustomers}, #{currentCustomerCount}, #{skillTags}, #{serviceLevel}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employees WHERE (role LIKE '%Service%' OR role LIKE '%ÂÆ¢Êúç%' OR role LIKE '%Manager%' OR role LIKE '%ÁÆ°ÁêÜ%')) as totalServices, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employees WHERE (role LIKE '%Service%' OR role LIKE '%ÂÆ¢Êúç%' OR role LIKE '%Manager%' OR role LIKE '%ÁÆ°ÁêÜ%') AND online_status = 1) as onlineServices, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM service_session WHERE session_status IN (0,1)) as activeSessions, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM service_session WHERE session_status = 0) as waitingQueue, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM service_session WHERE DATE(create_time) = CURDATE()) as todayServices, (SELECT AVG(wait_duration) FROM service_session WHERE wait_duration IS NOT NULL) as avgWaitTime, (SELECT AVG(service_duration) FROM service_session WHERE service_duration IS NOT NULL) as avgServiceTime, (SELECT AVG(user_rating) FROM service_session WHERE user_rating IS NOT NULL) as satisfaction
